headline: How News Corp’s Q2 2025 Results and Buybacks Could Shape the Outlook for News (NWSA) Investors
summary: In early February 2026, News Corporation reported second-quarter 2025 results showing higher revenue of US$2,362 million but lower net income of US$193 million year over year, alongside a US$0.10 per-share dividend and completion of a US$954.77 million buyback program initiated in 2021. Together with ongoing profit growth in its Dow Jones and Digital Real Estate units, these capital returns highlight News Corp’s focus on higher-margin, digital-first businesses while continuing to return cash...
